channel.title: (no name)
channel.description:
it has no name cause i want everyone whos helping with the server have there say. I was thinking to form a team of server, client, and web coders. I will not say a source that will be used cause i have no idea yet cause depends what the team thinks of like maybe they want richscape or blank its up to me and the team to decide. I wan this server to be a great one and i hope i get people who wanna really help with it and aren't just doing it to be owner or co. requirements -experience codeing -you must want to help code and not just volunteer to get owner or co. - a msn is high recommended
things we need (how many people so far chosen) more server coders(1) more client coders(0) web master(0) a person to run the serer 24-7(if is only open if none of the coder will be able to do this and i wont just choose anyone for this job)(0)
how to apply reply with the following -years codeing -server if you have one -msn if you have one -what position you want to apply for - why you want to work fo this project[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 04:50:41 pm[/size][hr]i have got so far 1 client coder from rune locus more positions available even still in client coder
